original_text: And the men pursued after them the way to Jordan unto the fords: and as soon as they which pursued after them were gone out, they shut the gate.
korean_text: 그 사람들은 요단 나루터까지 그들을 쫓아갔고 그들을 뒤쫓는 자들이 나가자 곧 성문을 닫았더라

sentences.original_text: And the men pursued after them the way to Jordan
sentences.korean_translation: 그 남자들이 그들을 요단으로 가는 길을 따라 추격하였고

sentences.original_text: and as soon as they which pursued after them were gone out
